title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the InnovationIncubator platform, including features, user roles, workflows, and integration with existing systems.

title: Design System Architecture - RFC Review and Revisions
description: Design the overall system architecture for the InnovationIncubator project, including components, data flow, technology stack, and infrastructure requirements. Consider scalability, maintainability, security aspects, provide a high-level overview, detailed component diagrams, and suggestions on optimizations. This RFC is open for discussion, improvements, and suggestions. The following changes are proposed: 1. Break the architecture design into smaller tasks for easier implementation and review. 2. Incorporate microservices approach to increase scalability and maintainability. 3. Provide detailed explanations of chosen technologies and their advantages. 4. Clarify infrastructure requirements, including cloud services, storage solutions, and database configurations.

title: Design User Interface and Experience (UI/UX) - Refactored
description: Refine the design of the user interface and user experience for the InnovationIncubator platform. This includes wireframes, mockups, prototypes, accessibility considerations, high-fidelity visual design elements, and interactive design elements. Collaborate with stakeholders to ensure the design aligns with project goals, meets user needs, and is scalable for future growth. Also, consider performance optimizations and progressive enhancement for better cross-device compatibility.
dependencies: Conduct User Research and Persona Analysis

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment, including version control, build tools, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines.

title: Design Database Schema for InnovationIncubator
description: Design the database schema to store and manage innovation initiatives, user data, roles and permissions, and other relevant information. Consider scalability, security, and performance requirements. The design should be modular, extensible, and adhere to best practices for data modeling. Additionally, ensure the schema is compatible with our existing systems for seamless integration. Also, consider implementing version control mechanisms for easier updates and rollbacks.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop and implement backend services for the platform, including APIs, business logic, and integration with other systems.

title: Implement Frontend Components
description: Develop and implement frontend components for the platform, including user interfaces, navigation, and interactions.

title: Implement Comprehensive Security Measures (Revised)
description: Update the platform with robust security measures such as multi-factor authentication, role-based access control, data encryption at rest and in transit, regular vulnerability testing, secure coding practices, and implementation of a centralized logging system for monitoring and auditing purposes.

title: Write Documentation
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the platform, including user guides, developer guides, and API documentation.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform thorough testing and quality assurance for the platform, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deploy and Monitor Platform
description: Deploy the InnovationIncubator platform to production environments, and set up monitoring and logging systems.
